publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3795.2 John Swinburne: Local Government Finance—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3795) in the name of Mr John Swinney, after first “council tax” insert “and recognises that these alterations would enable all pensioner household council tax liability to be reduced by 50% and those single pensioner households which currently receive a 50% rebate to have this further increased to a 75% rebate”
